metadata.description: It's MONSTROUS! New mini-series pits Top Cow against classic monsters! Ultimate evil is coming to the Top Cow universe, and ALL of the Cow's stars must unite to stave off an apocalypse! The seeds are sown when Dracula invades London, and only the Magdalena can stop him! But can Drac turn Maggy into a vampire...or will the Tomb Raider be able to stop him? Find out here, and be on the lookout for NEXT month's chapter: Tomb Raider vs. the Wolf-Men!
metadata.name: Monster War
